QuestData.Title: WANTED: Altered Sentinel
QuestData.Description:
Praetor broken! At Aspirant's Crucible. Attacking everybody!
Something wrong. Maybe changed?
Simo not know how to fix. Tried everything!
Must destroy!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: It is beyond repair and must be destroyed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the Altered Sentinel for Forgehand Simo in Aspirant's Rest.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Forgehand Simo in Aspirant's Rest.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh! Broke praetor is gone? Sad. So sad. But thank you-hoo!
